comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Noted woman suffragist and civil rights activist Elisabeth Freeman (1876-1942) is the subject of an entire web site. Note the variant spelling of her first name used on the web site. Note that it does not extend to the site's url. What's up with that?

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for her: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Freeman_(suffragist)
